rules_text: Counter target spell if its mana value is less than or equal to the total mana value of permanents you control.
flavor_text: [i]The gods' decree was absolute. If Pina wanted the amulet, they'd have to earn it—alone. And in the end, they lost more than just the prize.[/i]
